member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the added tab.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.Clear

summary.para: Removes all tabs from the ribbon tab collection.

member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the tab collection.

summary.para: Retrieves a tab from the collection by a tab index.

member.param: A zero-based index of the tab.
member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the tab.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.GetByName(System.String)

summary.para: Retrieves a specific tab from the collection.

member.returns: The tab builder.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.GetByTitle(System.String)

summary.para: Retrieves a tab from the collection by a tab title.

member.returns: The tab builder.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.Insert(System.Int32)

summary.para: Inserts a new tab to the ribbon tab collection at the specified position.

member.param: The position to insert the tab.
member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the inserted tab.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.RemoveAt(System.Int32)

summary.para: Removes a tab at the specified position from the ribbon tab collection.

member.param: A zero-based index of the tab to remove.
member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the tab collection.

summary.para: Removes a tab with the specified name from the ribbon tab collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Office.RibbonTabCollectionBuilder`3.RemoveByTitle(System.String)

summary.para: Removes a tab with the specified title from the ribbon tab collection.

member.returns: An object that can be used to further configure the tab collection.
